Description: Gotham Men's Gold-Tone 17 Jewel Exhibition Mechanical Pocket Watch with Built-In Stand # GWC14055G FEATURES Classic and elegant gold-tone 17 jewel mechanical open face exhibition pocket watch with Roman numeral dial Beautiful exhibition case back showing all moving parts Rich antique style blue cobalt hour, minute and seconds hands plus scratch resistant mineral crystal Includes matching 15" curb pocket watch chain with spring ring attachment Arrives in beautiful gift box with Selvyt polishing cloth, lifetime limited warranty and operating instructions DESCRIPTION This classic and sophisticated reproduction style pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collections. Features include a highly polished round gold-tone brass case with built in stand, white textured dial with applied silver-tone Roman numerals and open center to expose the intricate 17 jewel mechanical movement and scratch resistant mineral crystals, front and back. Additional features include bold blue cobalt hands, and a deluxe 15 inch curb link chain with spring ring attachment that can attach to you belt loop. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged and include operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your watch clean. This is truly a beautiful watch at a great price.
